name: PowerShell cmdlet parameter spacing
description: LLM formats PowerShell parameters with different spacing
original:
# Deploy application to Azure
Param(
    [Parameter(Mandatory=$true)]
    [string]$ResourceGroupName,
    
    [Parameter(Mandatory=$true)]
    [string]$AppServiceName,
    
    [Parameter(Mandatory=$false)]
    [string]$Environment = "staging"
)

Write-Host "Starting deployment to $Environment"

$webApp = Get-AzWebApp -ResourceGroupName $ResourceGroupName -Name $AppServiceName

if ($null -eq $webApp) {
    Write-Error "Web app not found: $AppServiceName"
    exit 1
}

llm_edit.new_text:
$webApp = Get-AzWebApp -ResourceGroupName $ResourceGroupName -Name $AppServiceName

if ($null -eq $webApp) {
    Write-Error "Web app not found: $AppServiceName"
    exit 1
}

Write-Host "Found web app: $($webApp.Name)"
Write-Host "Current state: $($webApp.State)"

expected:
# Deploy application to Azure
Param(
    [Parameter(Mandatory=$true)]
    [string]$ResourceGroupName,
    
    [Parameter(Mandatory=$true)]
    [string]$AppServiceName,
    
    [Parameter(Mandatory=$false)]
    [string]$Environment = "staging"
)

Write-Host "Starting deployment to $Environment"

$webApp = Get-AzWebApp -ResourceGroupName $ResourceGroupName -Name $AppServiceName

if ($null -eq $webApp) {
    Write-Error "Web app not found: $AppServiceName"
    exit 1
}

Write-Host "Found web app: $($webApp.Name)"
Write-Host "Current state: $($webApp.State)"

metadata.failure_reason: LLM changed spacing around cmdlet parameters
